title: Research Scientist Intern, Audio, Numerical Acoustics (PhD)
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
• Design and optimize algorithms for audio research problems.  
• Execute experimental design for new audio technologies.  
• Collaborate with researchers and software engineers.  

**REQUIREMENTS:**
• 1+ years experience in wave phenomena and acoustic simulation.  
• Proficient in C/C++, Python, or MATLAB.  
• Currently pursuing a PhD in relevant STEM fields.  

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
• Numerical simulation of acoustics and wave-based modeling.  
• Machine learning and deep learning techniques.  
• Psychoacoustics and digital signal processing fundamentals.
condensed_description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**

**REQUIREMENTS:**

• Proficient in C/C++, Python, or MATLAB.  
• Currently pursuing a PhD in relevant STEM fields.  

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
• Numerical simulation of acoustics and wave-based modeling.  
• Machine learning and deep learning techniques.  
• Psychoacoustics and digital signal processing fundamentals.

title: Software Engineer, Intern/Co-op
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Develop and push production-ready code quickly.
- Complete tasks efficiently with minimal iterations.
- Identify problems and outline optimal solutions.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Enrolled in a full-time degree program in computer science.
- Experience coding in Java, Python, C++, or JavaScript.
- Must have work authorization in the employment country.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Java
- Python
- C++ 
- JavaScript 
- Objective-C

title: Cloud Security Engineer
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
• Design and implement AI-driven security systems for Meta’s products.  
• Develop security-focused code and frameworks for engineering teams.  
• Collaborate with partners to deliver scalable security solutions.  

**REQUIREMENTS:**
• B.S. or M.S. in Computer Science or related field.  
• 5+ years of experience in security systems design.  
• Proficiency in coding languages like Python, C/C++, or Go.  

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
• Cloud security and Infrastructure as Code (Terraform).  
• AI-driven security technologies for threat mitigation.  
• Metrics for measuring service effectiveness and consistency.
condensed_description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**

• B.S. or M.S. in Computer Science or related field.  
• 5+ years of experience in security systems design.  
• Proficiency in coding languages like Python, C/C++, or Go.  

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
• Cloud security and Infrastructure as Code (Terraform).  
• AI-driven security technologies for threat mitigation.  
• Metrics for measuring service effectiveness and consistency.

title: Software Engineer (Robotics)
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Collaborate with researchers to define technical goals and lead implementation.  
- Design and implement AI algorithms on robotic hardware and simulations.  
- Evaluate AI models on robotic systems, proposing performance improvements.  
- Communicate complex systems to diverse stakeholders.  
- Publish research impacting Meta product development.  

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.  
- 5+ years of experience in robotics or related field.  
- Experience in robotics research areas like reinforcement learning.  
- Proficiency in programming languages like Python or C++.  

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Machine learning frameworks such as PyTorch and TensorFlow.  
- Robotics fundamentals: perception, planning, and control.  
- Experience with robot simulations and real-world hardware.
condensed_description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**

- Publish research impacting Meta product development.  

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.  
- 5+ years of experience in robotics or related field.  
- Experience in robotics research areas like reinforcement learning.  
- Proficiency in programming languages like Python or C++.  

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Machine learning frameworks such as PyTorch and TensorFlow.  
- Robotics fundamentals: perception, planning, and control.  
- Experience with robot simulations and real-world hardware.

title: Global Systems Engineer
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Maximize server fleet uptime and utilization rates.
- Identify trends and resolve systemic issues.
- Collaborate with stakeholders to interpret operational needs.
- Mentor team members on issue resolution and tool updates.
- Write, review code, and debug complex systems.
- Define diagnostic tooling requirements with cross-functional teams.
- Execute validation for new product integration.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Engineering degree or equivalent experience.
- 7+ years in systems infrastructure operations.
- Experience with application configuration and maintenance.
- Proficient in higher-level programming languages.
- Familiarity with Linux systems.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Python, PHP, C++, Java.
- Web servers, load balancers, relational databases.
- Storage systems and messaging systems.

- Web servers, load balancers, relational databases.
- Storage systems and messaging systems.

title: Software Engineer, Android
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to build innovative applications.
- Implement custom user interfaces using modern programming techniques.
- Analyze and optimize code for quality and performance.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
- 2+ years programming experience in relevant languages.
- Experience building maintainable and testable code bases.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Android SDK, Java, Kotlin for Android applications.
- Multithreading programming and mobile memory management.
- API design and unit testing techniques.

title: Connectivity Engineer, Leased - Data Center Design, Engineering, & Construction
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Manage full project life-cycle from kick-off to operations.
- Create and maintain project scope, schedules, and milestones.
- Coordinate with cross-functional partners and vendors.
- Conduct quality assurance inspections and validate installations.
- Track project progress, risks, and change orders.
- Ensure adherence to safety regulations and best practices.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- 5+ years of project management experience.
- Experience in construction-related problem-solving.
- Proficient in MS Office and Google Suites.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Primavera 6 for project management.
- Fiber optic testing and troubleshooting tools.
- Outside plant cabling (OSP) deployment technologies.

description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Apply AI infrastructure and hardware acceleration techniques.
- Drive large efforts across multiple teams.
- Mentor engineers and improve engineering quality.

**REQUIREMENTS:**

- Specialized experience in machine learning or AI infrastructure.
- 3+ years of experience in AI framework development.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**

- Machine learning frameworks like PyTorch.
- Hardware accelerators and GPU architecture.

title: Data Engineer, Product Analytics
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Conceptualize and own data architecture for large-scale projects.
- Create frameworks to improve logging data efficacy.
- Collaborate with teams to understand data needs and insights.
- Define and manage Service Level Agreements for data sets.
- Implement security models based on privacy requirements.
- Design and launch sophisticated data models and visualizations.
- Solve complex data integration problems using ETL patterns.
- Optimize existing processes and complex code.
- Influence teams to identify impactful data opportunities.
- Mentor team members with actionable feedback.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
- 4+ years of data-related experience.
- 4+ years of experience with SQL and ETL.
- Proficiency in at least one programming language.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- SQL
- ETL frameworks
- Data modeling techniques
- Programming languages (e.g., Python, C++, C#, Scala)

title: Senior Software Engineer - Developer Automation Platform
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Build and support automated test and device management applications.
- Research to improve user experience and reduce manual toil.
- Drive cross-functional projects and integrate new use cases.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Strong understanding of client and server-side JavaScript.
- Experience building scalable and reliable tools and services.
- Excellent communication skills and collaborative mindset.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- JavaScript and TypeScript.
- React for enterprise applications (bonus).
- MongoDB and Linux operating systems.

title: Analytics Engineer (L5) - Ads DSE, Privacy & Consent Analytics
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Drive analytics strategy for consent management across Netflix Ads.
- Build metrics, dashboards, and frameworks for user consent analysis.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams on consent flows and compliance.
- Deliver predictive models for proactive consent optimization.
- Act as a subject matter expert on consent analytics.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Extensive experience in programmatic adtech analytics.
- Strong communication skills to influence stakeholders.
- Proficiency in SQL and at least one scripting language.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- SQL
- Apache Airflow
- Python

title: Machine Learning Engineer (L5 - Senior) , Ads Inventory Management & Forecasting
description:
RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Build real-time inventory forecasting solutions using ML models.  
• Develop systems for publisher inventory management and monetization strategies.  
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deploy models at scale.  

REQUIREMENTS:
• Experience in end-to-end ML model deployment for ad systems.  
• Proficient in handling large data volumes with big data tools.  
• Familiarity with advertising marketplace and publisher-side challenges.  

KEY TECHNOLOGIES:
• Machine Learning and predictive modeling.  
• Big data tools like Spark.  
• Lucene index and ad tech systems.

description:

- Lead re-architecture of AI-native products and automated pipelines.
- Collaborate with teams to transform AI models into products.

- Passion for innovation and pushing boundaries.
- Strong judgment in fast-paced environments.

- Generative AI and automated workflows.
- AI-native application development and deployment.

title: Security Engineer (L4), Identity
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Design and build Identity and Access security solutions.
- Collaborate with stakeholders on federated authentication and access management.
- Partner with vendors to enhance third-party Identity capabilities.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Proven experience in architecting Identity Lifecycle solutions.
- Strong communication skills to explain IAM concepts clearly.
- Experience with authentication and authorization standards and protocols.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Familiarity with Okta, Auth0, or similar IAM solutions.
- Proficient in Java or Python for CI/CD processes.
- Experience with AWS cloud computing platform.

title: Software Engineer (L5), Content & Business Products
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
• Build and optimize content production products and services.  
• Support enterprise needs for Finance, Talent, and Customer Support.  
• Participate in on-call rotation and lead incident reviews.  

**REQUIREMENTS:**

• Proficient in Java, C#, or other OO programming languages.  
• Strong communication skills for technical concepts with stakeholders.  

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
• gRPC, GraphQL, RESTful API design.  
• Distributed systems architecture and performance tuning.  
• Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS.

title: Distributed Systems Engineer (L4) - Cloud Engineering
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
• Build and operate services, APIs, and tooling for various use cases.  
• Engage with engineering users to understand and improve their experience.  
• Solve business needs at scale with high-quality solutions.  

**REQUIREMENTS:**
• 3-6 years of professional Software Engineering experience.  
• Proficient in Java, C++, Go, Python, or similar languages.  
• Experience with reliable distributed systems in cloud environments.  

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
• Open-source technologies like Envoy for service communication.  
• Titus for compute resource management and APIs.  
• Storage solutions for object/block/file resources at exabyte scale.
